Student Control System

A Student Control System: Moodle-like system to control, students, student's exams, practices and professors, it was a very extensive project. This was created using, HTML, CSS, Boottsrap, jQPlot, Bootstrap File Uploader, Ajax clalls, Colorbox, PHPMailer, and jQuery,

To login as a professor, use the email ingdsag@gmail.com and the password: 123.

To login as a student use the email martinencarmen256@gmail.com and the password 123.

Penal Sytem Online Leaflet

This was a contest we won for a company where I did a freelance job for the goverment of panama, on how to explain the new penal resolution, only 1 day, and we won!

This was developed using CSS and responsive media queries from 980px.

Click here to view it.

Centauro WP SMS Share plugin.

Centauro Share (Social Share Plugin with custom WordPress options)

This is a Wordpress plugin with custom options about sharing, that blocks by IP and IP attempts the Sending of an SMS text if you have contracted Centauro SMS from Venezuela, it works only for Venezuelan mobile phones.

The plugin shows you a basic functionality on how to create a database properly using Wordpress built in Syntax, so that everything is done properly.

Also, in the WordPress's backend you will be able to view how to setup features and store them in the WordPress Database properly.

Click here to view the source at github.
